issue.title: [C++][CI] Sporadic timeouts in arrow-gcsfs-test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16454](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16454). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It seems that `arrow-gcsfs-test` might have become less reliable recently, as some timeouts have started appearing in some builds, e.g.:
https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/6286469507?check_suite_focus=true#step:5:3464

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16454?focusedCommentId=17531649) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Hmm, it seems that build was based on an old git master, and this doesn't reproduce after a rebase. Will close.
